title: Compelled Duel
content:
Compelled Duel Level 1 Enchantment Spell Compel an enemy to attack only you. It cannot attack other creatures. 3 turns 9m WIS Save Concentration Bonus Action Level 1 Spell Slot

Level 1 Enchantment Spell

Compel an enemy to attack only you. It cannot attack other creatures.

9m WIS Save Concentration

Compelled Duel is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Compelled Duel is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Enchantment school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Baldur's Gate 3 Compelled Duel Information

Description: Compel an enemy to attack only you. It cannot attack other creatures. Level: Lvl 1 spell School: Enchantment School Casting Time: Bonus Action Range: 9m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: WIS Save

How to Acquire Compelled Duel in BG3

Compelled Duel can be acquired by the following classes: Paladin Oath of the Crown Compelled Duel can be cast by using the following Items: ???
